mapper.select: select * from wms_ware_sku where sku_id=#{skuId} and stock-stock_locked>#{count}
mapper.update: update wms_ware_sku set stock_locked = stock_locked+#{count} where id=#{id}
update wms_ware_sku set stock_locked = stock_locked-#{count} where id=#{id}
update wms_ware_sku set stock_locked = stock_locked-#{count},stock=stock-#{count} where id=#{id}
